When I first smelled it, I was split on whether to get a bottle because the oud was too animalic for me. But even in early Springtime when the weather's still cold, this is the perfect scent. Very smooth cardamom coffee blend. Constances sultry older sister.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="2140428"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=2140428#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2129694" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2129694" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sukipickles"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1905281"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1905281.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sukipickles" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2129694ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2129694" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1905281">Sukipickles</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-19">04/19/24 12:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance has my favourite opening in this range. The spice and jasmine against the backdrop of vanilla were pleasant and captivating the first couple of hours but later settled into vanilla sweetness. Very overpriced for that effect, but with so many other reviewers professing absolute love for it, perhaps it just doesn't perform on my skin chemistry.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="2129694"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=2129694#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2114106" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2114106" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Chesf"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1903937"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1903937.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Chesf" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Goldfield-Banks-Australia/Bohemian-Lime-60923.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.60923.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bohemian Lime"title="Bohemian Lime"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2114106ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2114106" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1903937">Chesf</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-04">04/04/24 09:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It is sweet and rich, with slight intriguing touch of animalic and civet (am surprised no one mentioned it).   Super rich oud + resinous amber and sweet incensy balsam.  The asian ingredients create mystery, intelligence, and sensuality in her character. It is epitome of warm sophistication in a winter.<br />
<br />
9/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="2114106"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=2114106#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2105521" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2105521" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="WildCalifornia"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2036447"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="WildCalifornia" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2105521ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2105521" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2036447">WildCalifornia</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-27">03/27/24 02:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Everything comes out at first blast. The cardamom  and coffee that is almost slightly chocolaty come on the  strongest followed by the jasmine ,oud and incense. As it dries down the fir and sweetness from the vanilla come out. This is definitely an incense fragrance and it's even slightly minty .  That's what pushes this more towards a unisex fragrance. For a man this is something you want to wear in a formal setting. Or on a night out with a leather jacket.  Like most of the Penhaligon collections this is a classic scent that has been modernized. <br />
I like this but don't live it. And at it's price I won't buy this. But it's a very nice fragrance that I appreciate. <br />
Performance is above average . It sticks to my skin for hours . I have been able to smell it's on the skin for a good 8 hours. As far as it projecting you get a good 3 hours .</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="2105521"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=2105521#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2092947" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2092947" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Infirmi&egrave;reParfum&eacute;e"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/815740"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.815740.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Infirmi&egrave;reParfum&eacute;e" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Carolina-Herrera/Very-Good-Girl-65560.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.65560.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Very Good Girl"title="Very Good Girl"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2092947ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2092947" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/815740">Infirmi&egrave;reParfum&eacute;e</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-14">03/14/24 22:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Brave the first notes and youll be in for a nice surprise.<br />
The Bewitching Yasmine has a strong spicy top sniff - it can be too strong for comfort but give it a few minutes to develop into what it was meant to be. <br />
A few minutes on my clothes and the essence of coffee and cardamom becomes obvious, topped with light vanilla and jasmine . The floral notes are very light. The cardamom is obvious and the coffee eventually turns into just a hint.<br />
<br />
Some might say that this is best for cold-weather shenanigans but I do not mind smelling like this on a nice spring day. <br />
<br />
Not for school or office . <br />
Age 35-65 (mature!)<br />
If you enjoy scents like Stronger With You, Althar and Spicebomb, you will enjoy this one.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="2092947"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=2092947#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2089713" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2089713" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="DDawson"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1780367"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1780367.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="DDawson" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ladanika/Mothers-Daughters-Docki-Materi-51247.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.51247.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mothers-Daughters -"title="Mothers-Daughters -"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2089713ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2089713" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1780367">DDawson</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-11">03/11/24 19:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Anyone else get baby wipes in the opening? No,just me. Okay.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="2089713"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=2089713#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2089656" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2089656" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Retro_Futurista"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1385832"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1385832.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Retro_Futurista" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2089656ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2089656" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1385832">Retro_Futurista</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-11">03/11/24 18:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Oh Bewitching Yasmine how I just adore you. <br />
Shes sweet but dont let that fool you. Shes a gorgeous spicy oud with a jasmine heart. Waves of cardamom with a delicious lick able vanilla dry down. <br />
<br />
This is Florence Welch Dancing on stage in a long black gown, wrapped in candlelight, singing Dream Girl Evil. She casts a spell on the crowd and twirls her hand and spins to the penetrating beating of drums and guitar. Everything I wish to evoke.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="2089656"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=2089656#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2086149" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I wish I discovered this sooner. I ordered the Portraits Collection discovery set and this and few other feminine scents I instantly fell in love with. After wearing this for just a few hours, I went to the website and purchased the full bottle. I love how this fragrance/this brand hasn't gone viral on social media and I hope it stays that way, honestly. I hold this dear to my heart and something so special you don't want to share with everyone. So, if you also love this fragrance let's just keep it near and dear...and if you know, (lucky you) you know! ;)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="2078132"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=2078132#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2073270" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Cardamom and coffee are very mild. However not a unique scent to my nose</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="2073270"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=2073270#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2068976" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2068976" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="xvxmatthewxvx"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1028003"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1028003.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="xvxmatthewxvx" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Serge-Lutens/Five-O-Clock-Au-Gingembre-2764.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.2764.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Five O'Clock Au Gingembre"title="Five O'Clock Au Gingembre"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2068976ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2068976" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1028003">xvxmatthewxvx</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-21">02/21/24 00:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Vanilla, spices, amber, musk, play-dough, woods. The late dry down smells like cocoa or hazelnuts but I guess thats the coffee. I dont smell any jasmine and the oud is very light. The more I smell it the more I smell Noir Exquis from Lartisan Parfumeur which I love. 4-5 sprays consistent medium projection for several hours.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="2068976"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=2068976#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2065814" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2065814" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tanaC"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/75237"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.75237.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="tanaC" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2065814ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2065814" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/75237">tanaC</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-18">02/18/24 01:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The Bewitching Yasmine Penhaligon's<br />
(140 usd, bnib)<br />
<br />
First impression<br />
<br />
Bewitching Yasmine is a blind buy for me as I brought Sohan before hands. I think the whole concept of this family affair is really get me going a bit.<br />
<br />
At first, I was thinking it will be like Al-Khatt by Xerjoff. But its not. Bewitching Yasmine is not really florally instead Oudy - Gourmand instead.<br />
Somewhat it reminds me of Baklava. I have no idead why? But it has some nutty - baked bakery vibe to certain degree on my skin.<br />
<br />
The opening, the blast of this reminds me much of her bigger brother but it just less metallic. And it turns Baklava like on my skin. The green side doesnt really show.. only if you sniff real close. You starts to identify certain amount of Jasmine. Also, there is hefty dose of Smoke/mild incense undertone that I quite enjoy.<br />
<br />
I think, this is fairy upscale scent for woman.<br />
But still fun to enjoy. Its oudy-gourmand after all. A person who enjoy Oud Bouquet will fairly enjoy this (with additional hint of smokiness).<br />
<br />
Regarding bottle design, I was thinking that the animal head is a gimmicky but I starts to realize that the company is welly choose Animal.<br />
<br />
I think Cat head represents the alluring and charming aspect of Cat. Soft and Sweet. Also,<br />
Can refers to Bastet, God with face of cat in egypt.<br />
Devi of Home and Woman Secret. Seems so fit to theme so well.<br />
<br />
In addtional, Yasmine I personally interpreted as Yas+Jasmine (Yas is a playful or non-serious slang term equivalent to the excited or celebratory use of the interjection "yes!") depending on your interpretation I find this hilarious and well name.<br />
<br />
I am enjoying the scent personally, as usual offers from this collection it project averagely with great longevity.<br />
<br />
Score 8/10<br />
=====<br />
Update 1 (revisit on April 16, 2024)<br />
<br />
Today, I sprays Oud Bouquet and Bewitching Yasmine side by side.<br />
And it is actually not the same vain.<br />
<br />
It might share similarity in soft nuttiness accord but..<br />
<br />
Bewitching Yasmine resemblance another fragrance a bit more : Amouage Memoir the way of using Cardamom is similar, follow with Floral but.. this is emphasis on warm woody, ambery oud a bit more.<br />
=====<br />
Update 2 (Revisit on November 18, 2024)<br />
<br />
"An Ambery, Powdery Fragrance richs in Ambrettolide &amp; Ethyl Vanillin. A touch of Jasmine with Powdery Lactone. Really nice fragrance, easy to wear with good performance. Not oversharp consider all Chemical material<br />
<br />
Cardamom really plays and gives nice warm contrast of spice and sweet, feels very cocooning (reminds L'heure Bleue in spicy x iris aspect but that's clove) Feel like sweet vanilla Talcum with spice. After dry down, leaves very nice powder scent musky scent on skin.<br />
<br />
I don't find this overly oudy, might contains Real Oud just a touch  as dry bark like at very far end, very faint. More like a dry woodship. This is clean and alluring, innocent baby talcum way but sexy".<br />
<br />
Good score.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="2065814"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=2065814#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2053824" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2053824" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="marielune1024"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1882450"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1882450.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="marielune1024" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ex-Nihilo/Vesper-Glitz-79178.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.79178.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vesper Glitz"title="Vesper Glitz"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2053824ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2053824" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1882450">marielune1024</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-06">02/06/24 08:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Got a decant of this in a Penhaligon's store in Chelsea. I was unfamiliar with the brand and sniffing through their collections. This one stood out to me, it was sweet and deep and oud-y, so I brought it home. Knowing more about perfumes and the brand now I'm surprised at my choice, it doesn't really resemble much in my small collection and what I tend to gravitate towards, but I'm still happy to have it. Smells good but maybe sweeter than you'd think looking at the notes. To me this gives dessert, sweet syrupiness. It lasts extremely well on clothes. I have one sweater that's the same colour as the bottle so I've worn them together and if I pull the sweater out from my dresser now it smells of Bewitching Yasmine. Pretty sure it'll stay on there forever, but I don't mind. Lovely fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="2053824"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=2053824#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2043726" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2043726" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jezeleah"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1428644"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jezeleah" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Electimuss/Trajan-61808.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.61808.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Trajan"title="Trajan"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2043726ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2043726" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1428644">Jezeleah</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-27">01/27/24 11:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Somehow she reminds me of Gris Charnel! Must be the cardamom. Shes a beauty, with an oud anyone can get along with. Only slightly sweet, and very well blended. Adorable!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="2043726"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=2043726#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2022324" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2022324" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="themoonandthesky"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1948764"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="themoonandthesky" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2022324ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2022324" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1948764">themoonandthesky</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-06">01/06/24 08:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Suprisingly sweet <br />
On me I get hit with a sweet vanilla on this like a warm cupcake. Its very similar to L by lolita lempicka (which Ive heard is also similar to lira by xerjoff, havent tried the latter) I was quite surprised to not see any citrus notes because they smell alike to my nose, however theres like a dark boozyness to bewitching <br />
Yasmine thats intoxicating which keeps me wanting to press my nose on my skin constantly. Hints of incense also in the opening but not overpowering at all. As it dries  down  the rich vanilla is all I pick up. The silage is moderate and last around 3-5 hours. Lovely scent I can see  it being perfect for the cold weather</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="2022324"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=2022324#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2016698" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2016698" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="babypong"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1869030"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1869030.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="babypong" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Sol-de-Janeiro/Cheirosa-62-56062.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.56062.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cheirosa '62"title="Cheirosa '62"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2016698ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2016698" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1869030">babypong</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-01">01/01/24 03:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Love this scent. It has coffee and dark spicy vanilla and jasmine notes. She is not a light floral. The spice is not overpowering. I usually do not like spices or incense at all but this is actually a perfect blend. Even oud is something I cant stand, but in this fragrance its just a lovely blend. Out of all the penhaligons I have tried Yasmine is my favorite. Its a little too spicy to be something I would personally wear. I prefer lighter floral or gourmand sweet smells, but I can appreciate Yasmine for smelling good. The price point is really high though and while this has moderate silage I do reapply every 3-4 hours.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="2016698"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=2016698#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2016104" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Complex, seductive and overall just a delight. My only complaint is the performance. It doesn't project well at all for me and is mostly just a skin scent. :(</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="2016104"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=2016104#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2011354" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2011354" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SoheePark"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/924022"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.924022.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SoheePark" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/House-of-BO/Bombon-92543.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.92543.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bombon"title="Bombon"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2011354ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2011354" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/924022">SoheePark</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-26">12/26/23 14:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>On me it is not at all spicy, but it is such a deep and complex scent. The oud and coffee are strong yet very feminine. Big love for this perfume.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="2011354"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=2011354#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2008441" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2008441" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="smelling.sniffing.swan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1892188"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1892188.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="smelling.sniffing.swan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2008441ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2008441" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1892188">smelling.sniffing.swan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-22">12/22/23 21:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The Bewitching Yasmine really is bewitching, seductive and gorgeous<br />
I absolutely did not expect to enjoy this by reading about it beforehand, but I am very happy to be very incorrect.<br />
<br />
I found the opening very gourmand. I wanted to lick my arm.<br />
The warmth of the spices, cardamom and maybe some nutmeg, dancing around some wonderfully creamy vanilla, tea and salted caramel. Ugh gorgeous.<br />
Generally I would steer clear of anything described in that way, out of fear of a cloying, sickly sweetness. And there absolutely is sweetness here, but it is so intricately blended and balanced, I have absolutely no issue with it.<br />
<br />
Underneath is a wonderful, rich, authentic incense.<br />
My brain keeps coming back to the phrase, 'opium den'. <br />
I think it's the warmth, intoxication, addictiveness and light smokiness.<br />
<br />
As she dries down, the freshness within the spices settles down.<br />
Any gender could and SHOULD wear this.<br />
<br />
VERDICT: I think I just fell in love with Yasmine.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="2008441"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=2008441#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2001082" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2001082" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Buvana"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1918868"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1918868.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Buvana" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2001082ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2001082" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1918868">Buvana</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-14">12/14/23 08:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm addicted. One of the best feminine fragrance. Charming, sexy, alluring and exquisite. Wish it the sillage/projection was much stronger. The sweetness isn't cloying or headache inducing. Jasmine doesn't overpower and that's why I love it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="2001082"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=2001082#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1999554" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1999554" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Kjkoni"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1830246"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1830246.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Kjkoni" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.27040.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mojave Ghost"title="Mojave Ghost"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1999554ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1999554" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1830246">Kjkoni</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-12">12/12/23 13:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I must admit that I purchased this solely for the gorgeous bottle, as I am completely obsessed with cats and absolutely love the idea of the Portraits Collection (I would collect them all if they weren't so crazy expensive!)<br />
<br />
As for the scent- I had no idea what to expect since I do LOVE cardamom, coffee and vanilla but I struggle with jasmine, incense and oud. Now that I have her in my sweet little hands I can provide my first impression: In the opening- I do not get any cardamom or coffee, just a tiny bit of vanilla, but mostly-dominantly- I get jasmine and incense, and these notes blend together in a somewhat medicinal way that I find quite unharmonious, unsettling and not at all enjoyable. In the mid I begin to catch some soapiness along with the medicinal affects- almost creating a citronella type vibe, not a good thing. In the dry down- the medicinal parts have completely disappeared, so have the soapy aspects, now I catch a lot more vanilla- this is not an edible, gourmand vanilla, but this is a deep, fragrant vanilla enhanced with incense and I find a bit of the coffee shows up here too, interestingly this stage wears so much more lightly than expected- considering how the opening was so pungent and overwhelming. Its a bit of a weird journey in that sense. But once I get past the opening, the dry down is quite a nice, unassuming and delicate incensey-vanilla. It's kind of interesting because I find the deep dry down to be somewhat similar to the deep dry down of Bouquet Ideale- the vanillas are very similar and both have a delicate spiciness. Where BI mixes vanilla with cinnamon and woody elements, BY mixes vanilla with cardamom and incense. <br />
<br />
This is not my favorite fragrance, but I did not expect it to be... we will see how my relationship with it develops over time- but currently- the bottle is just gorgeous!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="1999554"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=1999554#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1999039" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1999039" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ZagaEffy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1593525"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1593525.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ZagaEffy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Cuir-Beluga-1019.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1019.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cuir Bluga"title="Cuir Bluga"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1999039ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1999039" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1593525">ZagaEffy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-11">12/11/23 23:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I fell in love with Yasmine, and no, it wasnt love at first sniff. It took me a couple of tries to understand that I love this beauty. It was the end of winter last year when I decided I needed to add her to my collection. When I finally did, the cold season was slowly ending, and Ive never felt like this perfume matches other seasons than fall or winter. Id use it mostly in wintera real, frosty, snowy winter. However, something happened, and it looks like this winter there is no chemistry between us anymore, which is very sad. <br />
<br />
I made some attempts and tried to wear it, but every time I end up feeling choked and slightly nauseous. As much as it breaks my heart, I think its time to part ways and let her go, to find some other loving nose, since I still believe Yasmine deserves that <br />
<br />
Its a very classy smell. Incense plays a big part, perhaps its slightly powdery, deep, rich So elegant. Needless to say, the bottle is a piece of art. As in all Penhaligons perfumes, the sprayer is amazing.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="1999039"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=1999039#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1994933" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1994933" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Smeraldina77"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1613700"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Smeraldina77" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Magenta-Tanzanite-71536.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.71536.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Magenta Tanzanite"title="Magenta Tanzanite"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1994933ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1994933" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1613700">Smeraldina77</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-07">12/07/23 06:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>To me, the most prominent notes are incense, vanilla, oud and fir balsam. Cardamom and coffee are very strong in the opening and I smell a bit of jasmine in the heart, but they fade away after 15 - 20 minutes.<br />
At the beginning, for again 15 -20 minutes, the oud smells a bit like rubber, but also this quality fades away (luckily).<br />
The dry down is sweet and balsamic, very very pleasant and pretty longlasting.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="1994933"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=1994933#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1962315" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1962315" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Hesssa21"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1861309"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1861309.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Hesssa21" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1962315ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1962315" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1861309">Hesssa21</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-27">10/27/23 12:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Beautiful, feminine fragrance. Starts with a spicy (cardamom) jasmine, then settles to a vanilla/oud. I don't smell the coffee note in this. The oud in this is sweet/smokey/leathery. If you're not a fan of oud I'd suggest trying this as it's more of a western interpretation of oud (in my opinion) that you would probably enjoy. I see that it's Laotian oud (not a synthetic) which is more of a sweet, smokey oud but I don't think there is a very high concentration of it in this perfume so it can be more 'likeable' I presume. This is a very smooth, warm and versatile scent. I do really like it but just not enough to purchase a bottle. If you don't like jasmine, I recommend trying this too as it's not an overdose of jasmine so you might like this one...</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="1962315"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=1962315#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1946645" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1946645" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sniffathon"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1357164"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1357164.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sniffathon" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1946645ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1946645" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1357164">Sniffathon</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-07">10/07/23 16:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Such a wonderful feminine oud and vanilla fragrance that is so beautifully blended. The oud is polite and smooth, the vanilla warm but not sweet. Very minimal smokiness which is great for if youre shy of incense fragrances. Unique and unlike anything else I can compare it to. However it is extremely hard to just the price! I have thoroughly enjoyed wearing my decant but wont be purchasing for this reason. It sure is a stunner but not overly special enough to be full bottle worthy at the price.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="1946645"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=1946645#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1942621" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
