padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1385540">taytyperry</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-10-16">10/16/21 16:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Wow. This smells so heavenly. <br />
I cant even describe how this smells but its so addicting and I cant stop smelling myself. This is definitely going to be a full bottle purchase.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="1429365"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=1429365#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1428840" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1428840" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BewitchingJasmine"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1391365"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1391365.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="BewitchingJasmine" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Comptoir-Sud-Pacifique/Vanille-Banane-744.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.744.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vanille Banane"title="Vanille Banane"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1428840ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1428840" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1391365">BewitchingJasmine</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-10-15">10/15/21 17:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A vanilla latte sprinkled with cardamom, sipped while burning incense. <br />
<br />
Smooth, smokey, sweet and cozy<br />
<br />
Very good silage. On a walk with friends they kept catching whiffs of a very nice incense</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="1428840"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=1428840#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1425984" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1425984" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Josu01"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1019527"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1019527.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Josu01" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Scandal-Pour-Homme-Absolu-91053.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.91053.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Scandal Pour Homme Absolu"title="Scandal Pour Homme Absolu"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1425984ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1425984" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1019527">Josu01</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-10-10">10/10/21 19:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Beautiful perfume.  Love at first sniff of course.  This is totally unisex to me. The bewitching Yasmine smells very oriental, has great longevity and sillage.  <br />
<br />
I find that it smells very similar to Oudh 36 Nuit from Al Haramain, which is one of my favorite fragrances, and costs a fraction of The bewitching Yasmine.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="1425984"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=1425984#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1419321" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1419321" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Tania71727"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1383848"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Tania71727" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1419321ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1419321" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1383848">Tania71727</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-09-29">09/29/21 17:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This for me was huge love at first sniff, then I sprayed it on myself and by the end of the day I knew Id just found my signature scent. On my skin its a beautiful sweet coffee smell with incense and slight spice in the background. I got so many compliments all day. This is definitely not a safe blind buy but I love it so much.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="1419321"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=1419321#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1417751" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; My overall rating: 5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="1356553"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=1356553#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1347976" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1347976" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="clarag33"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1324371"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="clarag33" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tauer-Perfumes/09-Orange-Star-8670.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.8670.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="09 Orange Star"title="09 Orange Star"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1347976ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1347976" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1324371">clarag33</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-05-23">05/23/21 04:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>On my to-buy full size list well blended, ticks a lot of boxes for me, I ive that is a slightly dark dultry scent that is still appropriate enough for day and office wear for me</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="1347976"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=1347976#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1340745" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1340745" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Tee"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/5564"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.5564.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Tee" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lush/Guardian-of-The-Forest-62542.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.62542.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Guardian of The Forest"title="Guardian of The Forest"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1340745ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1340745" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/5564">Tee</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-05-10">05/10/21 00:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>i've been trying few coffee scents this week. I can say this offers the most yummy opening. that coffee with cardamom is just nice... combined with soft rounded unoffensive bitter oud. i got a faint whiff of jasmine . the vanilla just sweeten things up a little bit , without being overly sticky syrupy. i truly enjoy the balance here. <br />
<br />
with name like that, I was expecting more jasmine. but, it was just a whiff. this is more of a gourmand coffee-oud combo-that is very nice. those wanting to try oud , but not the classic oud-rose combo, this i will gladly recommend to try. dont be too worried with the initial blast... it dissipates fast and turns closer to skin, more comfortable</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="1340745"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=1340745#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1335920" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1335920" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sarinaamani"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1130845"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1130845.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sarinaamani" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1335920ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1335920" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1130845">Sarinaamani</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-05-02">05/02/21 02:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A very sweet gourmand leaning oud scent, the oud is subtle but present. As someone who loves wearing oud but is nervous about offending those around me, this is absolutely perfect to wear comfortably as its not a polarising scent at all. The sweetness from the vanilla helps balances out the incense and the oud which makes it very likeable. Can be a bit cloying if overdone but a little goes a long way. I always seem to gravitate towards this scent for a date night, its quite sexy and seductive in a very out there way. Can see why some people get a sweet cough syrup vibe but not in a bad way. Overpriced but the bottle is cute so that's a plus.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="1335920"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=1335920#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1334778" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1328517" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SweetBriar"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1018716"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1018716.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SweetBriar" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Guidance-78656.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.78656.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Guidance"title="Guidance"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1328517ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1328517" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83); A root beer float vibe going on- lots of vanilla ice cream- very creamy.  Heavenly!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="1328517"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=1328517#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1327185" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1327185" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="KarenEKeller"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/206993"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="KarenEKeller" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/DS-Durga/Poppy-Rouge-12010.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.12010.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Poppy Rouge"title="Poppy Rouge"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1327185ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1327185" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/206993">KarenEKeller</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-04-17">04/17/21 10:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I bought this in a flurry of excitement after testing it at the Covent Garden shop in London. I'm not sure what happened, but almost immediately upon returning home from my holiday, I deeply regretted the very expensive purchase, and still am a couple of years later. Once in a while I try it again to see if I come around to it once again. <br />
Initially, I almost always love the smell. Then it just overwhelms anything and everything, to the point that I would feel far too self-conscious wearing this in public, as I'm sure it would make many people gag. It just reeks of the most over-perfumed, nose-blind person who walks into a room and takes over the entire space.<br />
It depresses me that I wasted this much money on a fragrance that I really can't wear in any context or season. Sigh. Fundamentally, the scent is great in concept. It is just way too heavy and seems to grow larger with the heat of the skin, and seems impossible to shake.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="1327185"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=1327185#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1324258" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1324258" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="oncebitten"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/863037"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.863037.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="oncebitten" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/Libre-Intense-62318.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.62318.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Libre Intense"title="Libre Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1324258ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1324258" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/863037">oncebitten</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-04-12">04/12/21 13:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is wonderful. The first hour is spicy and almost medicinal (and weirdly, maybe even a little sour on my skin?) but ohhhh once this dries down, it's magic. A deep, woodsy, creamy vanilla latte. ETA: THIS is what I wanted Hilde Soliani Buonissimo to smell like on me, but I was so disappointed in the longevity of that one! Barely lasted half an hour on my skin. I've already gotten a good six hours out of this, with decent sillage and projection, so I'm a happy camper right now.<br />
<br />
In short: yummmm. The price is steep enough that I want to try it out a few more times before I commit to full bottle, but my initial impression is great!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="1324258"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=1324258#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1307504" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1307504" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="diaanz81"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1225540"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1225540.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="diaanz81" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1307504ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1307504" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1225540">diaanz81</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-03-13">03/13/21 21:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Bewitching indeed! Quite recently, I became interested in Penhaligon's because I learnt that this was a rather prestigious BRITISH fragrance house. As an anglophile, anything British piques my interest and the Portrait's collection was like siren song to the animal lover that I am. <br />
<br />
The notes in Yasmine intrigued me because I pretty much like them all so I got it and it has certainly lived up to it's name. Sweet green cardamom, sublime oud, airy jasmine, light vanilla and a hint of incense are most discernible to my sniffer (unfortunately, I don't get any coffee which I was rather looking forward to). To me, this is not like your typical heavy oud/incense fragrances, it's almost light (as in not dense) and to some degree, I would even say bright scent. Oud lovers will likely find the oud note in this to be on the lighter side because even though it is the most prominent note, it is still lighter and one of the more (if not the most) mass appealing take on oud than what I've typically smelt. Crazy as this might sound, the combination and blend of these notes, on my skin, reminds me of Pepsi (not coke), after the fizz has died down. It dances along a very fine line to being classified a gourmand but it doesn't really cross that line for me.  <br />
<br />
I would happily wear this in the day during summer and in my opinion, this a year round fragrance. Performance is better than average on skin, lasting up to 5-6 hours with moderate sillage. I have a feeling it will perform better on clothes but beware of the rich dark red color of the juice. This is a big love for me and the best introduction I could have hoped for, to a house that I look forward to exploring more.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="1307504"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=1307504#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1300787" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1300787" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Chrononomicon"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1262147"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1262147.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Chrononomicon" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1300787ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1300787" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1262147">Chrononomicon</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-03-01">03/01/21 16:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Cardamom, coffee, and cough syrup over an oud &amp; honey blend that's very reminiscent of Oud Bouquet by Lancome and Raghba by Lattafa in terms of its backbone.<br />
<br />
Syrupy sweet, cloying, yet there's something in here that's soapy, aldehydic, and soft as well (Jasmine, Fir, and Oud?) Speaking of the oud, I don't get much here. There is a pissy facet deep in the base but I couldn't tell you if that's the indole quality of Jasmine or the animalic quality of the Laotian Oud. What little oud there is (especially its aldehydic, heady, and gruff qualities) are unfortunately well disguised in a thick concoction of coumarin/vanilla, spices, and incense.<br />
<br />
Either way, for a fragrance with a cat or sphynx head as its cap, and the notes listed, I was expecting it to..., "mark its territory," a bit more.<br />
<br />
All in all a well-blended fragrance to my nose, but not exactly worth the price tag.<br />
<br />
Sillage: High<br />
<br />
Longevity: ~7 hours on my skin<br />
<br />
Scent: 7.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="1300787"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=1300787#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1283956" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1283956" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jasmine hadid"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1301334"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="jasmine hadid" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1283956ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1283956" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1301334">jasmine hadid</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-01-29">01/29/21 16:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The more I wore it the more I disliked it. Only for cold weather</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="1283956"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=1283956#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1282275" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1282275" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ono_adj"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1271415"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ono_adj" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Olfactive-Studio/Chypre-Shot-51698.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.51698.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Chypre Shot"title="Chypre Shot"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1282275ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1282275" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1271415">Ono_adj</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-01-26">01/26/21 14:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>So gorgeous to me. I bought a sample from them, and I see myself getting a full bottle so long as the dry down doesnt let me down.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="1282275"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=1282275#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1281056" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1281056" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mystical fragrance lover"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1277940"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mystical fragrance lover" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Diptyque/Eau-Duelle-Eau-de-Parfum-49100.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.49100.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eau Duelle Eau de Parfum"title="Eau Duelle Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1281056ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1281056" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1277940">Mystical fragrance lover</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-01-24">01/24/21 06:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Judging by the reviews I feel I may be in the minority of loving this fragrance! But I feel it is a bit of a love or hate fragrance!<br />
<br />
The initial spray and for me I get absolutely smacked in the face with the oud and incense! It is in your face and not shy at all!! But this part doesnt last too long, they both start to fade into the background and the warming but heavy hitting vanilla comes through but the jasmine cuts through the sweetness. But then the cardomon adds a little spice to give it yet more dimension. The coffee is just there lurking in the background.<br />
<br />
Longevity wise it stays for like ever on clothes, but for skin a little less but still very apparent after 8 hours. My only gripe is that for such a loud a bold entrance it does soften to more of a whisper in comparison. This makes me hesitant to stretch to a full bottle. That being said I dont know if I would have liked the bold opening to continue for too much longer than it does however I wish the dry down had a bit more of the character of the opening! Yasmine definitely has 2 sides to me! Bold and upfront but also soft and gentle but still with a little spice. <br />
<br />
However, with the opening being as it is I still tend to wear it on days when I'm feeling bold and wear it very much for myself as it's such a polarising fragrance! I might stretch the wear to early Spring but I really cant see it in summer, that opening it will kill people! </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="1281056"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=1281056#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1269718" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1269718" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Doresasultanian"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1289792"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1289792.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Doresasultanian" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1269718ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1269718" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1289792">Doresasultanian</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-01-03">01/03/21 02:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>There is something special about this and on other hand there is something revulsive. After trying a sample i loved and after losing my money on 75ml i hate it !!!!!!! Don't ask me how this happened because I don't know. Harsh and depressing for me. I liked the written notes more than their scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="1269718"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=1269718#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1267430" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1267430" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="pamplemousse2"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1263750"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1263750.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="pamplemousse2" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1267430ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1267430" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1263750">pamplemousse2</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-12-29">12/29/20 15:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>So, this was interesting. Just like AnEnglishRose, I was very interested in this based on the notes, but agree that I've only been able to smell vanilla and spice/cardamom, and was surprised when I rechecked the notes that jasmine, coffee, and smoke were supposed to be in here because I didn't get any of that. My boyfriend said it smelled bubblegum-y and too sweet/candy like, and too young and not refined for what he'd imagine for me, and also that it was not sexy or sophisticated. <br />
<br />
About 45 minutes later, the oud starts to come out more, but it still smells very cloyingly sweet and strong. This is definitely a very different and unique fragrance from others I've tried, and stronger than most others as well. I could see some of the spiciness and oud making this 'witchy' and mysterious, but I don't think this is for me and the heavy sweetness is a bit overwhelming. I can't tell if I like this or not. I do like vanilla, but I'm not the hugest fan of oud, so there's parts of this that I like, and other parts I'm eh about. But the projection and longevity are very impressive.<br />
<br />
Two hours later and it's still very strong, but pretty much just oud and a hint of vanilla now, as it has been for the last hour or so. If you like oud, then this would be a good one to try. <br />
<br />
Initially spraying this, it's more "feminine" with the sweetness, but this heavy oudy scent in the drydown I would say makes this now lean a bit more "masculine."<br />
<br />
5 hours later, it's just a skin scent and smells like the typical "doll head" powdery plasticy vanilla, almost like a diaper smell against the warmth of my skin.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="1267430"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=1267430#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1263252" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1263252" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Waten"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1263919"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Waten" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1263252ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1263252" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1263919">Waten</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-12-20">12/20/20 00:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>In the opening it is aggressive and annoying, just like cough syrup to me, After that hustle and bustle settles into a regular vanilla. Not worth the price</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="1263252"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=1263252#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1239405" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1239405" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AnEnglishRose"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1238427"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="AnEnglishRose" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Le-Lion-Eau-de-Parfum-61036.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.61036.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Le Lion Eau de Parfum"title="Le Lion Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1239405ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1239405" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1238427">AnEnglishRose</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-10-21">10/21/20 08:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Gosh how I wanted to love this based on the notes. <br />
<br />
Alas, on my skin it's highly medicinal and so syrupy sweet. <br />
<br />
I can smell plenty of vanilla and sweet spice, but barely any jasmine, coffee or smoke? <br />
<br />
It's a sweet sticky cough syrup. Cloying, annoying and definitely not sexy or sophisticated.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="1239405"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=1239405#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1222923" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1222923" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="CC317"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1254408"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1254408.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="CC317" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/EBK/Ruby-N-Vanilla-Intense-75876.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.75876.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ruby N Vanilla Intense"title="Ruby N Vanilla Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1222923ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1222923" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1254408">CC317</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-09-11">09/11/20 04:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells amazing but the lasting power is not that great, however its still worth it. I layer it with bdk rouge smoking  that combo is so sexyyyy! And the lasting power is longer once layered. Def a compliment getter together.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="1222923"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=1222923#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1188602" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1188602" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Avian"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/870536"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.870536.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="Avian" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Alkemia-Perfumes/Falling-Stars-on-Winter-Solstice-54086.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.54086.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Falling Stars on Winter Solstice"title="Falling Stars on Winter Solstice"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1188602ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1188602" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/870536">Avian</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-06-15">06/15/20 07:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Yasmine opens with a boom of mouth-watering medium-roast coffee, with a pump of cardamom syrup. As it dries down, that accord unfortunately fades, and is replaced with a decadent vanilla/praline and smokey oud incense accord. Hmm, familiar? It has been done several years prior with elegance and polish in Lancome Oud Bouquet. It still smells lovely in Bewitching Yasmine, but the incredible similarity is disappointing. Yasmine brings nothing new to the table. The bottle is cute, but Oud Bouquet's bottle is beautiful. They are both reasonably pricey, given that they are intensely strong. If you have one, you do not need the other.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="1188602"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=1188602#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1178642" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1178642" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="salthewitch"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1157751"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1157751.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="salthewitch" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Valentino/Valentino-Donna-31411.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31411.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Valentino Donna"title="Valentino Donna"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1178642ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1178642" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1157751">salthewitch</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-05-21">05/21/20 14:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I am a practicing Witch, however I did not buy this due to the name - I got a sample when I bought Ruthless Countess. It just so happened I LOVED the name. This is all I will wear, as I cast circle on a midsummer's eve, with sweet incense burning amongst the smoky candles, and the hint of jasmine in the air swirls around a nearby creamy spicy coffee. Have you ever bought a fragrance, and thought 'this is it' You adore the smell so intensely that you have to top it up every 12 hours. You adore the dry down, you adore how it changes on your skin and you adore how everyone passing by declares 'what's that gorgeous smell??' At the end of its wearing, you put your wrists right up to your nose to take in the lingering remnants. Added bonus that your significant other asks to smell it too, or is he just wanting to smell me? Whatever. <br />
<br />
I am a witch, and this is my scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="1178642"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=1178642#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1172415" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
