padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1225372">for&ecirc;t</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-05-06">05/06/20 19:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Someone below was amazed an SA gave her a sample of this as a gourmand, which was what she wanted.  To me this is indeed gourmand s it is very sweet and I dont even smell the oud.  I like a lot of oud, not disguised oud.  Not sure I can get behind this which is unfortunate since I blind bought it.  I have now stopped blind buying- its fun to sample and then buy with a better idea in mind.  Anyway at least I only paid 1/2 retail, and I hope this might actually grow on me.  It doesnt even smell smoky to me- I must be crazy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="1172415"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=1172415#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1168736" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1168736" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dominicgoyer"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1231919"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1231919.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="dominicgoyer" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1168736ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1168736" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1231919">dominicgoyer</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-04-27">04/27/20 13:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smelled this out of curiosity. (The bottles of this serie are so darn cute!)<br />
And it was love at first... smell. When I asked about the notes, the seller was like : "This, is for women." <br />
But who cares when it smells so good. So I took a sample.<br />
It smells unisex to me. The incense is strong, the vanilla is smoky...<br />
I finished the sample quickly but still hesitated to go FB, since it is quite expensive.<br />
Then on my second sample, I asked the bf what he thought of it:<br />
"This, is for women."<br />
Oh well...<br />
IT STILL SMELL AMAZING!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="1168736"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=1168736#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1153396" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1153396" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LadyofWahey"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1195068"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1195068.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="LadyofWahey" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1153396ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1153396" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1195068">LadyofWahey</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-03-09">03/09/20 06:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Bewitching  most decidedly so.  A magic potion  absolutely.  A flurry of cardamom, incense, vanilla and all that oud  such a moreish concoction of come-hither-ness.  Beautiful bottle; wonderful scent with excellent longevity and sillage.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="1153396"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=1153396#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1126377" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1126377" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Lady Nightshadow"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1218445"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1218445.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Lady Nightshadow" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1126377ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1126377" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1218445">Lady Nightshadow</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-12-20">12/20/19 14:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Bewitching Yasmine is a dry, woody and smokey frangrance.<br />
On my skin, the combination of oud and incense comes immediately forward and it's not sweet or warm for the first hour - it's just a full blast serious cloud of dry aromatic wood on fire, watched from the distance, where you can't see or feel the warmth, but nevertheless you get badly intoxicated.<br />
<br />
When the scent develops, some really shy vanilla helps to refine the fragrance and to add a bit of sweetness. This can happen quite slowly in winter, but in warmer months it performs way better.<br />
If you can get through the first part, this aromatic sweet wood is definitely more enjoyable.<br />
Coffee and flowers are barely there, they simply adjust the otherwise aggressive and too persistent dryness of the woods.<br />
<br />
I would not wear Bewitching Yasmine again on myself, but I could really like it on a man, it's a lot masculine to my nose.<br />
This is the scent of a room filled with old english furniture with a lawyer resting on his Chesterfield sofa, tasting a glass of dry whiskey while thinking about the last complicated case.<br />
<br />
Compared to Babylon, that one is some aromatic wood dripping honey and soft spices, while Bewitching Yasmine is way more dry and smoky, there's oud and incense. Even sharing similarities in the DNA, they're not interchangeable. I personally like Babylon, while this one not so much.<br />
<br />
I'm more on the cookies, fruit jam, honey, cakes and Winnie the Pooh side of the spectrum.<br />
I don't know what the SA was thinking about when I highlighted my preference for gourmand vanilla and fruity scents, and she generously sampled me this, that gives me the same feeling as opening my mouth in front of a fireplace.<br />
<br />
If you enjoy ouds, this could be worth the price considering that it performs a lot better than Penhaligon's average both in projection and longevity.<br />
I'll just go back to my cookies.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="1126377"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=1126377#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1108737" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1108737" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tapalapaela"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1201916"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="tapalapaela" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hermes/Terre-d-Hermes-Parfum-8282.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.8282.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Terre d'Hermes Parfum"title="Terre d'Hermes Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1108737ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1108737" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1201916">tapalapaela</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-10-22">10/22/19 09:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I find it incredibly long lasting on my skin. One atomization on my wrist and I can still smell it after 2 days having showered in 3 ocasions. Really impressive performance, a very pleasant smell that lasts for a whole afternoon proyecting around you. After the first day you can still find it as a skin scent. I haven't tried it yet on clothes.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="1108737"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=1108737#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1089577" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1089577" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="CB23"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/998670"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.998670.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="CB23" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ex-Nihilo/Amber-Sky-39886.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.39886.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Amber Sky"title="Amber Sky"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1089577ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1089577" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/998670">CB23</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-08-20">08/20/19 03:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Firstly this doesnt smell anything like By the Fireplace.<br />
<br />
They are both in my top 20 and couldnt be more different.<br />
<br />
Secondly anyone voting poor or even average longevity should pick up a phone immediately and book to see an ENT. This stuff lasts an extremely long time. Im at 17 hours at the moment, including 2 showers and at least 6 hand washes and can easily detect it on my hand and it was just 2 sprays</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="1089577"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=1089577#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1078384" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1078384" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Singabera"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/21910"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.21910.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Singabera" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jul-et-Mad-Paris/Terrasse-a-St-Germain-16250.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.16250.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Terrasse  St-Germain"title="Terrasse  St-Germain"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1078384ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1078384" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/21910">Singabera</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-07-13">07/13/19 07:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I expected to see chestnuts or caramel notes here, like in Noir Exquis from L'Artisan or in By the fireplace by Margiela.<br />
They all smell very identical to me, so if you have one, think twice if you need others)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="1078384"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=1078384#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1076149" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1076149" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Luccia"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/215681"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.215681.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Luccia" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Paloma-Picasso/Paloma-Picasso-Eau-de-Toilette-29033.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.29033.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Paloma Picasso Eau de Toilette"title="Paloma Picasso Eau de Toilette"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1076149ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1076149" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/215681">Luccia</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-07-05">07/05/19 16:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Find its best sprayed into air and walked into because the facets show best when its a fine spray widely dispersed, that catches clothing and hair as well as skin. For me its a beautiful cloak of darkened jasmine, the background  oud holds it steady for ages. Very rich so goes on the knockout side of the perfume shelf. As another note mentioned I too happened to get this to mark a trip to England and Scotland. For me its a great scent translation of Pre-Raphaelite/Orientalist luxury or like something that a Tudor would scent a present with. Its a love and dramatic in a sensitive way that is not overwhelming unless over applied.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="1076149"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=1076149#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1072909" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1072909" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cocofluff"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1141155"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1141155.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="cocofluff" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Etat-Libre-d-Orange/Bendelirious-4511.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4511.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bendelirious"title="Bendelirious"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1072909ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1072909" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1141155">cocofluff</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-06-24">06/24/19 16:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Yasmine smells very dark/deep/dense and leathery to my nose. Burst of coffee and smells syrupy initially. There is a lot of oud in here for the oud lovers among us but not the type of sugared oud I love. The oud is a little bit skanky but not too much to handle.<br />
<br />
I don't get much fir. I would love it if it had much more distinct coffee and incense notes. I definitely like it but it's not a love of mine. Maybe love will bloom over time.<br />
<br />
EDIT: This is so familiar and I finally figured out that it reminds me of Intoxicated by Kilian. Not the same but similar coffee/cardamom vibe. This also reminds of Fidelis by HdP. I like Fidelis best out of these 3 perfumes. -</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="1072909"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=1072909#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1056333" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/5931">pimentosugars</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-05-02">05/02/19 04:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This luscious smokey oud and vanilla combo is for winter. I am trying to work out if it lasts all winter too. I tried it two days ago and the smell just will not leave my skin!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="1056333"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=1056333#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1054630" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1054630" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="shushkin"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/106159"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.106159.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="shushkin" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/4160-Tuesdays/White-Queen-51566.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.51566.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="White Queen"title="White Queen"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1054630ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1054630" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/106159">shushkin</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-04-26">04/26/19 07:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I LOVE Noir Exquis and treasure my bottle. I have also tested Aoud Vanille and Pardon. They are both very pleasant scents.<br />
I don't like this heavy hitter. Jasmine is the first note to hit you between the eyes. Then I get the coffee, cardamom and then a tsunami of oud!!!!<br />
I usually love the big hitters but this is not even a like. I admit it's not quite so bad after 15 mins or so. It's still a nuclear, curious gourmand jasmine, oud, coffee and cardamom bomb though just someone has tried to smother it with something. Blanket over a campfire perhaps!<br />
It's definitely unisex. This scrubber just has to hang around for hours of course. The sillage is way above average. Sorry to be so negative (a rare occasion for me) and this is after all just my experience.<br />
If you love oud then you will love this. If not then test with great caution. Do you get the feeling this fragrance is seriously aimed to please the folk from the Middle East. My Mum is a typical super pale English Rose and her face said it all when she smelt this</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="1054630"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=1054630#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1019273" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1019273" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="flaviano1978"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1178614"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1178614.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="flaviano1978" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Le-Couvent-Maison-de-Parfum/Cologne-of-the-Missions-18811.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.18811.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cologne of the Missions"title="Cologne of the Missions"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1019273ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1019273" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1178614">flaviano1978</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-01-11">01/11/19 06:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I own 3 of the Portraits:Lady Blanche, Countess Dorothea and Yasmine. From the 3 this would be my favourite. I'm quite careful nowadays when it comes to oud as this scent stands out from the rest of the notes and mostly smells quite masculine.<br />
It's true, Yasmine smells like LP's Noir Exquis. But with the extra oud in this it makes it quite elegant and it blends well with the other notes so you get a seductive, sultry fragrance.  Longevity and sillage is also excellent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="1019273"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=1019273#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1000305" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1000305" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BBWinston"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1171761"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1171761.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="BBWinston" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1000305ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck8x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1000305" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1171761">BBWinston</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-11-12">11/12/18 15:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>**Disclaimer** I am a straight-up lay-person with no olfactory pedigree who dropped hella bank on a lil bottle of Yasmine to commemorate a fantastic trip to London. Cool that this interesting combination exists in the form of a perfume. Why did I buy it? Because it has quite a spectrum of moods--it is very sweet, smoky, woody, and gourmand. Just beautiful. The scent lasts and lasts. I think this one is perfect for fall and winter. It has the warmth and sweetness of a spiced blend, and I get some Port Wine vibes, too. This scent will definitely keep me on my toes in New England when Winter comes for our throats!!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="1000305"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=1000305#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent985584" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc985584" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="churinl"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/731667"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.731667.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="churinl" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Coromandel-Eau-de-Parfum-41783.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.41783.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Coromandel Eau de Parfum"title="Coromandel Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma985584ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd985584" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/731667">churinl</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-09-26">09/26/18 15:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Ooh! Yasmine! You ARE bewitching! This is the first time I have sampled a perfume from Penhalgion, and I am definitely under the spell of this beauty. In many ways, she reminds me of vintage Poison. Not so much as a smell but rather as a feeling, like you are wearing a potent tool of seduction that must be yielded with discretion, lest it overwhelm and cause the spell to backfire! I need to study her more to really understand the notes at play here, but my sample is so small and it may be a while before I can add this to my collection. In the meantime, I will save what I have and only use it on the nights when I want to be suggestive and seductive. This is an oud I can, and do, love. I will own this some day!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="985584"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=985584#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent983269" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It lived up to it's title and ,did ,indeed 'bewitch' me. padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/132621">gtabasso</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-08-08">08/08/18 17:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>coffee, vanilla and oud that read like a chocolate tobacco with a hint of fir and cardamom; similar to A*men in the top but there's no wood in this other than the balsam hint; this reads gourmand through and through and is even better. Delicious. I want to nuzzle myself. That little darkness of the oud keeps it edgy. This is not watered and close like the first Portraits series. This is a monster.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="969970"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=969970#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent947732" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc947732" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MysticRose"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/879583"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.879583.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MysticRose" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Cuir-Majeste-40057.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.40057.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cuir Majeste"title="Cuir Majeste"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma947732ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd947732" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/879583">MysticRose</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-05-30">05/30/18 01:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Simply divine. A very elegant and wearable everyday oud that wreaks of femininity. It's rather syrupy (not too much) and spicy, very sexy but sophisticated. I love love love it. The staying power is amazing. I bought a sample from Penhaligon's and I put three sprays on in the morning (each wrist and my neck), I can still smell it on myself after 8 hours.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="947732"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=947732#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent939488" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc939488" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Perfume Beginners"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1092780"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1092780.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Perfume Beginners" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ormonde-Jayne/Ta-if-4922.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4922.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ta'if"title="Ta'if"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma939488ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd939488" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1092780">Perfume Beginners</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-05-04">05/04/18 16:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Oud, vanilla and jasmine sambac are obvious in the scent. I always fall for jasmine sambac as it provides a warm yet floral seductive hue. Jasmine smells nice but unfortunately it does not work on my skin whereas jasmine sambac does. A fragrance smells so sexy and sensual whenever there is jasmine sambac in its formula.<br />
<br />
The dry down is better than the beginning in which the oud is a bit too strong and you can literally smell nothing but oud. Nevertheless, you can appreciate the oud blending with other notes at its dry down. There is a same DNA in Bewitching Yasmine and Uncompromising Sohan and I do not solely mean oud.<br />
<br />
Anyway it is a beautiful scent and the portraits collection never disappoints me albeit I dislike some of them but I have to admit that they have a unique and original smell which I smell nowhere. Probably the only dry back is the price.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="939488"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=939488#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent889011" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc889011" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="DBF85"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1024668"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1024668.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="DBF85" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hermes/Kelly-Caleche-1335.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1335.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Kelly Calche"title="Kelly Calche"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma889011ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd889011" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1024668">DBF85</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-12-11">12/11/17 08:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The perfume demands attention.<br />
<br />
A strong Cardamom, Coffee and Musky scent starts then appears the Oud dragging along Sweet Vanilla. <br />
<br />
The perfume is not bad and great for Winter, but might be annoying to other people around.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="889011"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=889011#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent888665" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc888665" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Q80"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/698615"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.698615.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Q80" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma888665ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd888665" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/698615">Q80</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-12-10">12/10/17 04:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Yasmine is the Arabic pronounciation of jasmine and this fragrance is everything but jasmine so far (from 0 to 3 mins in).<br />
<br />
The top note and the first spray is vanilla at MAX and slight dark for, cardamom, and hints of coffee. As a matter of fact, I keep in sniffing sweet vanilla for certain amount of time (5 mins) till the oud note comes up balancing the juice.<br />
<br />
There is some sweet Amber as well and kind of sweet incense.<br />
<br />
I remember sniffing this fragrance a month ago and I loved it quite much back then because of the sweetness I get yet no jasmines detected, also I remember back then that the jasmines starts to appear right after the coffee note weakened which most probably after 30 minutes. I need to test it more in order to know if the jasmines really comes out after 30 minutes or it was just an imagination!<br />
<br />
After all, this fragrance is superbly good and amazingly blended, I might go for a full bottle since this us the 2nd time I am testing it. Enchanting.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="888665"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=888665#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent877113" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc877113" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lydia.izzy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/968746"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.968746.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="lydia.izzy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Gloria-Vanderbilt/Vanderbilt-955.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.955.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vanderbilt"title="Vanderbilt"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma877113ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd877113" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/968746">lydia.izzy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-11-04">11/04/17 07:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Thick syrupy oud. Has a woody sap quality to it. It feels very caramel and gourmand like. I think it smells like Moroccan Jasmine and cardamon tea with many teaspoons of sugar in - I imagine a lovely tea shop with inscence burning and coffee being brewed.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="877113"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=877113#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="46504" sentiment="all"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-positive-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Positive Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent1000305" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1000305" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BBWinston"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1171761"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1171761.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="BBWinston" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1000305ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck8x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1000305" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1171761">BBWinston</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-11-12">11/12/18 15:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>**Disclaimer** I am a straight-up lay-person with no olfactory pedigree who dropped hella bank on a lil bottle of Yasmine to commemorate a fantastic trip to London. Cool that this interesting combination exists in the form of a perfume. Why did I buy it? Because it has quite a spectrum of moods--it is very sweet, smoky, woody, and gourmand. Just beautiful. The scent lasts and lasts. I think this one is perfect for fall and winter. It has the warmth and sweetness of a spiced blend, and I get some Port Wine vibes, too. This scent will definitely keep me on my toes in New England when Winter comes for our throats!!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="1000305"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=1000305#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1634099" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1634099" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="electricwitchard"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1561732"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="electricwitchard" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1634099ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1634099" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1561732">electricwitchard</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-08-30">08/30/22 00:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have long used Fragrantica reviews as my perfume bible to explore and test new scents. The comments and reviews have gone so right so many times (Musc Ravageur, my signature scent) and wrong only once (Black Orchid, a syrupy sweet headache) so when I first bought The Bewitching Yasmine I knew I had to make an account to pay it forward and leave my first review. <br />
<br />
This perfume is perfect. I cannot fault it. Its the scent I have been searching for my entire life. Its the femme fatale, its sex appeal, its the woman/person you want to be. The vanilla is grown up, not anything like the imitation vanilla shoved in every celebrity perfume. The coffee is like that boujee coffee shop you go in sometimes to treat yourself because they have the best croissants and its a social faux pas to order anything with milk. And hours later (5-6 on my skin) youre left with a stunning, stunning oud. <br />
<br />
I have never been so torn as to save this for the most special occasions, or drown myself in it every day. <br />
<br />
Buy this perfume. Or dont, so Im the best smelling person in the room.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="1634099"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=1634099#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1168736" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1168736" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dominicgoyer"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1231919"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1231919.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="dominicgoyer" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1168736ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1168736" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1231919">dominicgoyer</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-04-27">04/27/20 13:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smelled this out of curiosity. (The bottles of this serie are so darn cute!)<br />
And it was love at first... smell. When I asked about the notes, the seller was like : "This, is for women." <br />
But who cares when it smells so good. So I took a sample.<br />
It smells unisex to me. The incense is strong, the vanilla is smoky...<br />
I finished the sample quickly but still hesitated to go FB, since it is quite expensive.<br />
Then on my second sample, I asked the bf what he thought of it:<br />
"This, is for women."<br />
Oh well...<br />
IT STILL SMELL AMAZING!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="1168736"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=1168736#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1838276" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1838276" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SilkyWoods"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1507238"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1507238.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SilkyWoods" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Xerjoff/Shunkoin-16449.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.16449.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Shunkoin"title="Shunkoin"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1838276ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1838276" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1507238">SilkyWoods</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-21">05/21/23 02:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Whats not to like?<br />
Cardamom, good. <br />
Jasmine, gooood. <br />
Incense, gooooooood. <br />
<br />
I dont get the negative reviews but to each their own of course. <br />
This might be my favorite fragrance of all time. <br />
Its soooo seductive and sexy but not in a I want others to see me as sexy way, but in a I know myself and my worth and I am confident and dont care about what others think kind of way, if that makes any sense.<br />
<br />
It gives me so much confidence, power and it really helps with my low esteem issues. <br />
Stretched out my sample for ages and finally splurged in a FB. I cant be happy without this in my collection.<br />
<br />
It lasts and projects and I wear it in any season and at any time.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="1838276"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=1838276#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent985584" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/731667">churinl</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-09-26">09/26/18 15:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Ooh! Yasmine! You ARE bewitching! This is the first time I have sampled a perfume from Penhalgion, and I am definitely under the spell of this beauty. In many ways, she reminds me of vintage Poison. Not so much as a smell but rather as a feeling, like you are wearing a potent tool of seduction that must be yielded with discretion, lest it overwhelm and cause the spell to backfire! I need to study her more to really understand the notes at play here, but my sample is so small and it may be a while before I can add this to my collection. In the meantime, I will save what I have and only use it on the nights when I want to be suggestive and seductive. This is an oud I can, and do, love. I will own this some day!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="985584"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=985584#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="46504" sentiment="positive"></reviews-infinity>
