</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-negative-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Negative Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent1072909" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1072909" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cocofluff"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1141155"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1141155.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="cocofluff" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Etat-Libre-d-Orange/Bendelirious-4511.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4511.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bendelirious"title="Bendelirious"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1072909ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1072909" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1141155">cocofluff</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-06-24">06/24/19 16:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Yasmine smells very dark/deep/dense and leathery to my nose. Burst of coffee and smells syrupy initially. There is a lot of oud in here for the oud lovers among us but not the type of sugared oud I love. The oud is a little bit skanky but not too much to handle.<br />
<br />
I don't get much fir. I would love it if it had much more distinct coffee and incense notes. I definitely like it but it's not a love of mine. Maybe love will bloom over time.<br />
<br />
EDIT: This is so familiar and I finally figured out that it reminds me of Intoxicated by Kilian. Not the same but similar coffee/cardamom vibe. This also reminds of Fidelis by HdP. I like Fidelis best out of these 3 perfumes. -</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="1072909"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=1072909#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1239405" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1239405" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AnEnglishRose"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1238427"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="AnEnglishRose" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Le-Lion-Eau-de-Parfum-61036.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.61036.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Le Lion Eau de Parfum"title="Le Lion Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1239405ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1239405" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1238427">AnEnglishRose</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-10-21">10/21/20 08:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Gosh how I wanted to love this based on the notes. <br />
<br />
Alas, on my skin it's highly medicinal and so syrupy sweet. <br />
<br />
I can smell plenty of vanilla and sweet spice, but barely any jasmine, coffee or smoke? <br />
<br />
It's a sweet sticky cough syrup. Cloying, annoying and definitely not sexy or sophisticated.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="1239405"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=1239405#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1054630" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1054630" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="shushkin"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/106159"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.106159.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="shushkin" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/4160-Tuesdays/White-Queen-51566.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.51566.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="White Queen"title="White Queen"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1054630ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1054630" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/106159">shushkin</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-04-26">04/26/19 07:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I LOVE Noir Exquis and treasure my bottle. I have also tested Aoud Vanille and Pardon. They are both very pleasant scents.<br />
I don't like this heavy hitter. Jasmine is the first note to hit you between the eyes. Then I get the coffee, cardamom and then a tsunami of oud!!!!<br />
I usually love the big hitters but this is not even a like. I admit it's not quite so bad after 15 mins or so. It's still a nuclear, curious gourmand jasmine, oud, coffee and cardamom bomb though just someone has tried to smother it with something. Blanket over a campfire perhaps!<br />
It's definitely unisex. This scrubber just has to hang around for hours of course. The sillage is way above average. Sorry to be so negative (a rare occasion for me) and this is after all just my experience.<br />
If you love oud then you will love this. If not then test with great caution. Do you get the feeling this fragrance is seriously aimed to please the folk from the Middle East. My Mum is a typical super pale English Rose and her face said it all when she smelt this</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="1054630"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=1054630#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1485420" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1485420" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="iszzieanna"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1234905"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1234905.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="iszzieanna" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1485420ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1485420" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1234905">iszzieanna</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-01-17">01/17/22 23:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm getting two completely different fragrances depending on when I smell this. On one hand, it's for a younger crowd. there's a syrupy sweetness in this. It's almost like over-ripe berries with marshmallows on top. It makes the fragrance very immature and for a younger crowd. The fragrance stays sickly sweet and this prolongs through the life of the scent.<br />
<br />
But on the other hand, this smells like a more middle eastern centred fragrance. I get the incense along with rubbery and synthetic oud. Not the cold and metallic type, the burning tar type. On top I get a sight bit of warm cardamom and sugary vanilla. There's no coffee to be found which ever way this scent pulls.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="1485420"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=1485420#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1126377" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1126377" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Lady Nightshadow"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1218445"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1218445.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Lady Nightshadow" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1126377ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1126377" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1218445">Lady Nightshadow</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-12-20">12/20/19 14:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Bewitching Yasmine is a dry, woody and smokey frangrance.<br />
On my skin, the combination of oud and incense comes immediately forward and it's not sweet or warm for the first hour - it's just a full blast serious cloud of dry aromatic wood on fire, watched from the distance, where you can't see or feel the warmth, but nevertheless you get badly intoxicated.<br />
<br />
When the scent develops, some really shy vanilla helps to refine the fragrance and to add a bit of sweetness. This can happen quite slowly in winter, but in warmer months it performs way better.<br />
If you can get through the first part, this aromatic sweet wood is definitely more enjoyable.<br />
Coffee and flowers are barely there, they simply adjust the otherwise aggressive and too persistent dryness of the woods.<br />
<br />
I would not wear Bewitching Yasmine again on myself, but I could really like it on a man, it's a lot masculine to my nose.<br />
This is the scent of a room filled with old english furniture with a lawyer resting on his Chesterfield sofa, tasting a glass of dry whiskey while thinking about the last complicated case.<br />
<br />
Compared to Babylon, that one is some aromatic wood dripping honey and soft spices, while Bewitching Yasmine is way more dry and smoky, there's oud and incense. Even sharing similarities in the DNA, they're not interchangeable. I personally like Babylon, while this one not so much.<br />
<br />
I'm more on the cookies, fruit jam, honey, cakes and Winnie the Pooh side of the spectrum.<br />
I don't know what the SA was thinking about when I highlighted my preference for gourmand vanilla and fruity scents, and she generously sampled me this, that gives me the same feeling as opening my mouth in front of a fireplace.<br />
<br />
If you enjoy ouds, this could be worth the price considering that it performs a lot better than Penhaligon's average both in projection and longevity.<br />
I'll just go back to my cookies.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46504"comment_id="1126377"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Bewitching-Yasmine-46504.html?ccid=1126377#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="46504" sentiment="negative"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="search-reviews"><search-perfume-reviews :perfume_id="46504":random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]"></search-perfume-reviews></div></div><foundation-tabs></foundation-tabs></reviews-wrapper></div><perfume-shortcut-menu :perfume_id="46504" when-hidden="#toptop"></perfume-shortcut-menu><initialize-status-data></initialize-status-data><div class="cell small-12"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_footer -->

        <span class="avatar-tip" data-tooltip aria-haspopup="true" data-show-on="medium" data-disable-hover="false"
              tabindex="1" title="I dont quite get the appeal of this. It opens with a very strong minty menthol smell with possibly a hint of apple and some woods in the back. It smells exactly like Carmex lip balm and I just cant get why people like that">by
            <em>Mhyckal</em> <img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/s.1475781.jpg"

        </span>
    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 1.7em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">57.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/designers/Le-Labo.html" class="en2inter">Le Labo</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 1.7em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">58.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/designers/Zoologist-Perfumes.html" class="en2inter">Zoologist Perfumes</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 1.7em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">59.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/designers/Juliette-Has-A-Gun.html" class="en2inter">Juliette Has A Gun</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 1.7em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">60.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/designers/Roja-Dove.html" class="en2inter">Roja Dove</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            </div>
        </div>
                            <div style="clear: bottom; margin-top: 1rem;"></div>

            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.com") });
                if (lang == 'DE') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.de").replace(/designers/, "Designer").replace(/perfume/, "Parfum") });
                if (lang == 'ES') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.es").replace(/designers/, "disenador") });
                if (lang == 'FR') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.fr").replace(/designers/, "designer").replace(/perfume/, "parfum") });
                if (lang == 'CS') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.cz").replace(/designers/, "designer") });
                if (lang == 'IT') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.it").replace(/designers/, "designer") });
                if (lang == 'RU') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.ru") });
                if (lang == 'PL') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.pl").replace(/designers/, "marki").replace(/perfume/, "perfumy") });
                if (lang == 'PT') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.com.br").replace(/designers/, "desenhista") });
                if (lang == 'EL') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.gr").replace(/designers/, "designer") });
                if (lang == 'ZH') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.asia").replace(/designers/, "designer") });
                if (lang == 'NL') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.nl").replace(/designers/, "ontwerper").replace(/perfume/, "parfum") });
                if (lang == 'SR') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.punmiris.com").replace(/designers/, "dizajner").replace(/perfume/, "parfem") });
                if (lang == 'RO') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.ro").replace(/designers/, "creatori").replace(/perfume/, "parfum") });
                if (lang == 'AR') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragranticarabia.com").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
                if (lang == 'UK') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.ua").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
                if (lang == 'MN') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.mn").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
                if (lang == 'HE') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.co.il").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
            });
</script>


<script  data-cfasync="false">
    // Check that service workers are supported
    if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
        // Use the window load event to keep the page load performant
        window.addEventListener('load', () => {
            navigator.serviceWorker.register('/service-worker.js?v=rtgFFe5cbbe5e5f689826b719ace22a5b2a11');
        });
    }
</script>
<script>
    $(document).ready(function () {
        $('#fragranticaloader').fadeOut(20);
    });
</script>
</body>
</html>
